org.mindroid.api

Class BasicAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mindroid.api.BasicAPI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    org.mindroid.api.ImperativeAPI

    public abstract class BasicAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    This API provides the basic methods executable on any robot which do not depend on the implementation style (Statemachine/Imperative).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      BasicAPI()

      • setLED

        public final void setLED(EV3StatusLightColor color,
                         EV3StatusLightInterval interval)
        Sets the LED to the given color
        Parameters:
        color - the EV3StatusLightColor to use
        interval - the blink interval in milliseconds

      • setLEDOff

        public final void setLEDOff()
        Turns off the LED

      • drawString

        public final void drawString(java.lang.String text,
                             org.mindroid.impl.brick.Textsize textsize,
                             int xPosition,
                             int yPosition)
        Displays the given text onto the EV3 display at the given position (xPosition, yPosition). The coordinate (0,0) is at the top-left corner of the display.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to display
        textsize - Size of the string drawn on the display
        xPosition - the x position
        yPosition - the y position

      • getNextMessage

        public final org.mindroid.common.messages.server.MindroidMessage getNextMessage()
        Returns the next message in line. The message will then be removed from the messenger and cant be retrieved again! Returns null, when no message is in line. Use hasMessage() to check if there is a message in line.
        Returns:
        the next message in line.
